author: TravisEz13
body:
Draft of Contribution Guide update
refactored maintainers portions of the docs into a separate area and added an overall maintainers doc
Including a version of Jim's test guidance since I'm linking to it.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: You should move this links down (after they are used) #Pending

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body:
Making a note here that I'll be reviewing this over the next 24 hours. There's some definitely some overlap here with the governance doc I owe this week which deep-dive on the Committee, maintainers, and area owers. 

There'll probably a few tweaks to this doc to adjust to that model, but I think that the approach is probably to merge this PR and I'll refactor from there. Still, I'll give my comments here ASAP #Resolved

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
> [build-linux]: docs/building/linux.md

I think they should be at the bottom of the doc.  So that it is consistent.

comments.body: @TravisEz13 readme.md is broken. Some contents  get lost under Developing and Contributing. Can you please fix it?
